mapper.select: select store_name, store_tel, store_addr, store_email from TBL_STORE where lat=#{LAT} and lng=#{LNG}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (store_email, review_content, review_dt, user_email, review_rating, review_photo) values (#{store_email},#{review_content}, sysdate, #{user_email}, #{review_rating},#{review_photo})
mapper.select: select store_name from tbl_store a, tbl_review b where a.store_email = b.store_email
